other_tests.findings: Erythrocytes with abundant intracellular parasite forms morphologically consistent with Babesia spp., estimated at 15% based on a representative 2000-cell count.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-procedure blood smear showed a decrease in parasitemia to <1%.
